name: Plugin Name: 99dl DoanloandMangager
author: 99839.

sections.description:
This plugin make shortcodes to use in your post or pages. Use it to open downland link or imges using the lightbox effect.

How to use

Development by 99dl DoanloandMangager and based on http://famspam.com/facebox
sections.installation:
1.Upload 99-DoanloandMangager.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3.enjoy it.

how to use

[idl id="code" t="text"] links [/idl].
sections.faq: This plugin don’t have admin setting!if you want to modify the content.open the”99-DoanloandMangager” and edit it!
